meanings.definition: A repeated or additional performance at the end of a concert.
meanings.sent1: The audience clapped for an encore after the singer finished.
meanings.sent2: The band received a standing ovation before returning for an encore.
meanings.sent3: The encore was so good that the crowd demanded another one.
meanings.sent4: Her encore was like a sweet melody that lingered in the air long after the concert ended.
meanings.sent5: The encore left a lasting impression on everyone who attended the concert.
